short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives you an overview of how many words on a page you know

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension that shows you total Japanese words on a web page and known words (based on jpdb reviews). 
Just add your jpdb API key: Go to settings > Account information -> API key. 
Change or leave as it is list of allowed website domains/names and press save

You will see a report on every page that corresponds to your settings

Source https://github.com/getmane/jp-comprehension-predict
